summary: Defines a filter component that determines which security checks are executed during a scan. It interprets include/exclude patterns, severity levels, policy exceptions, enforcement rules, and external check definitions to dynamically enable or suppress checks across different code categories and languages.
business_intent: Enable users to enforce custom security policies and compliance requirements by selectively running, skipping, or adjusting the severity of checks, thereby reducing noise, handling false positives, and integrating external or policyâ€‘driven rules into the scanning workflow.
